short_summary: The Canadian Government has announced the launch of the Request for Information (RFI) process for the procurement of various marine-related services for the Sea Lines of Communication. The services constitute the scope of marine management and maintenance contracts which involves managing and maintaining the sea transport and transportation infrastructure and submitting a comprehensive and updated work plan listing marine projects.
description: A Marine Infrastructure Action Plan (MIAP) has been proposed and details regarding carrying out the work is further explained with conditions and requirements.
tags: Marine     Infrastructure, Action Plan, Sea Lines of Communication, Military
